phrases: Do Not Know why she did this.
She could have just handed it over to
That is not what I am talking about.
Wh-What have you done to Hideyo?
It is quite... a curve ball.
I thought returning it normally would be too serious and boring,
so I looked around the Internet for ideas
and found this amusing folding technique.
When I opened this by the shoe lockers,
I damn near bust a gut.
I did not consider the consequences.
It is not what you think.
I just find it cute that a high schooler
is awkwardly but earnestly trying to change.
It is like watching a kid sister grow up.
Feel free to call me Kazu-kun.
none of them will remember me a year from now.
Wh-Why are your scores getting worse?!
Arata's scores do not surprise me,
but I thought An-chan would at least pass one.
Hey, why do not my scores surprise you?
Because you always gossip when we try to study!
Like asking if you and I are go
What the hell are you trying to say?
I am telling her about how you asked if me and her were going out.
And why would you tell her that?
I just thought you two should get an earful from her, too.
You are the one she would be mad at, not us.
Sensei asked both class reps to come to the staff room.
Sorry, I did not hear her.
Dumber than I would imagined, too.
I was better when I was actually in school!
Actually, I can do better than this.
I just... have not put my mind to it yet.
Makes you sick, does not it?
I would not go that far.
But with math, they say that you should put something down even if you have no idea.
You are the first person to ever call me that!
I do not know, maybe try smiling a little more?
I have got to try harder to make friends.
You have got it wrong, Kariu.
She was trying for a friendly smile.
She is clearly making fun of me!
Yeah, I totally know how you feel, but I mean it.
Arata-kun, are you friends with Hishiro-san?
And you are still covering for her?
Come to think of it, the other day at lunch, you loaned her...
Do not forget to write your name on the record sheet.
Guys start with the handball toss.
Amatsu-sensei, could you not stand so close?
If we shout over each other, nobody will hear us.
Usa-sensei, your voice is stupid loud, so I am sure it will be fine.
If you have got a problem, move yourself.
Class 4's homeroom teacher, Usa-sensei, was Amatsu-sensei's senior in college.
Oga, you really suck at this stuff.
Let us go in order of roll number.
What is the average for third-year boys?
Way too high a record to start with, Asaji-kun!
Well, the dude is well built.
Kids these days are in great shape.
Are you trying to kill me?!
I saw a guy not paying attention,
so I figured I would teach him that looking away can be dangerous.
Inukai-kun threw that really hard, too.
So far, both guys have been far above average.
Is this national average even accurate?
Maybe take a break from studying and work out?
Looks like you are not so good at sports.
Let us see how you do!
I was always pretty decent at this stuff.
I grew up in the country!
I will show these wimpy city kids...!
When did I get this stiff?
Adults need to warm up first,
Want me to take you to the nurse's office?
He will be fine if he puts some spit on it.
Aki, I do not think that works for shoulder injuries.
But if you need anything, just ask.
Arata-kun, not only are you stupid, you also suck at sports?
You are too young to be as bad as you are.
You are going to make me cry.
She is the volleyball team captain.
I am on the volleyball team!
Bet that is rough for her.
But really slow compared to you.
You do not have to compare yourself to others!
I always want to be first.
Do not say stuff like that!
Looks like Kariu-san and Tamarai-san get along okay.
Did not Kariu say that the other day?
Rivals are not always enemies, huh?
This is what having legal high school girls
You were just leering at Tama, were not you?
He just gets awfully worked up where Tama-chan's concerned...
Those two and Tamarai-san have known each other since kindergarten.
And Tamarai-san and Inukai-kun are going out, or something?
It was dumb to even ask you.
You, the redhead who ran 7.38 seconds.
Why would you remember my time?
It is a pretty good time.
As for your name, I am sorry.
I do not know it, so I could not use it.
We were on the class rep committee all of last year.
Sorry, but I just do not remember it.
Would you tell me your name?
What is with this mocking, victorious smirk?!
Am I not even worth remembering?
It is my pleasure, Hishiro Chizuru-san.
I spoke to you because I need you to take over stopwatch duty.
I never imagined she would not even remember my name.
And here I thought we were rivals.
Okay, we are doing 50m sprints next.
It is like you deliberately scored the average.
I am surprised you can even manage that.
This is my second year as a student.
I am not out of shape, like you are.
Well, getting that rusty body back in shape is part of ReLIFE.
But you would better remember that your body is not young before you hurt yourself.
I know the youth around you gets you all fired up.
But you do not want others to say so?
You are at a delicate age, huh?
And you were actually leering at those girls, right?
Inukai went after you for it.
We will not stop love, but please... no crimes.
If I do not warm up,
it will be a repeat of the ball mess.
I might even get a cramp...
And, in the worst-case scenario, snap my Achilles tendon.
I do not see anyone in front...
At kindergarten or grade school sports festivals,
there are dads who get all fired up to run
but lose their balance and fall flat on their faces.
I will take you to the nurse's office.
Usa-sensei, we will be in the nurse's office.
Do not worry, I am strong enough!
Princess-carried by a dude ten years younger...
What is up with the boys?
Looks like Arata-kun tripped and hurt himself.
I mean, I am alone, too.
It is been a while, but it has not...
Is that the natural healing power of a high school student?
I have not fallen down since grade school.
I did not think she was the type.
But she acts nice around the boys.
The other day, we had a physical fitness test.
I would explained to him before that he only looked young, and inside, he was still twenty-seven.
Perhaps it was not easy to adjust, even though he knew in his head,
He seemed quite unhappy to have kids ten years younger feeling sorry for him,
but it is helped him find his place in the class.
It is pretty clear now which classmates he gets along with.
It is been a month since he started school.
It is not easy to form a community that fast with high school kids.
One month since the experiment began.
Still is not fitting in with the class.
Still getting used to the high school experience.
Nothing worth reporting happened today, either.
Nothing worth reporting happened today, either.
Quite a gap between samples no.
He seemed quite unhappy to have kids ten years younger feeling sorry for him, but it is helped him find his place in the class.
He is had his share of mishaps, but his ReLIFE appears to be progressing well.
He is smiling more than he did as a NEET.
And I think Kaizaki-san's aware of it, as well...
I cannot believe I lost to Honoka in all the fitness tests.
I wish I could say the same for myself.
